posts.name: Norm the Niner
posts.content: Home basketball game tonight @ 7:30pm. Stop by Cone to hang out and eat free pizza from 6pm to game time. See You There!

posts.name: Jacob Nohnson
posts.content: If anyone is interested in playing spring intramural sports, there is an interest meeting in Belk Gym today at 4pm, followed by open gym. Great way to meet future teammates and new friends!

posts.name: Isaac Boothe
posts.content: Meeting up in the Union tonight at 6pm to hang. Anyone feel free to join if you're free

posts.name: Michael Jordan
posts.content: Anyone want to meet up at the UREC and workout? heading there at around 3:30pm today
